*: This utility must be used in live mode only!

This tool should be used in LIVE MODE and to restore the BigLinux BOOT installed on the HD or SSD. If the installed system is starting properly there are no problems in the boot, so it is better not continue the use of this tool. It probably works also with other Linux distributions. Your computer is not connected to the internet, options 2 and 3 need internet to work.

Select the option you want: The restoration can be done in 3 ways (Simple, Intermediate or Complete), in case of doubt, try the first restart your computer and see if it's resolved. If the problem persists try the other options.
Option
Description
Simple, just write Grub back to the beginning of the disk.
Intermediate, reinstalls the grub package on the partition, regenerates the configuration and updates the initrd.
It completes, performs the interim restore steps, upgrades the system, and checks if the LTS kernel is installed.
Interactive, opens a terminal within the selected system.
Interactive, opens the control center within the selected system.
Interactive, opens the pamac-manager package manager within the selected system.
Done!
